Home.heading: Jsme banda softwarových nadšenců. Tvoříme, inovujeme a cestou občas porušíme pár pravidel.
Home.subheading: Jsme odvážní, troufalí a trochu drzí a s nadšením vytváříme výjimečné webové produkty a pomáháme firmám posunout jejich projekty na vyšší úroveň.

Newsletter.intro: Vždy pracujeme na nějakém zajímavém projektu. Můžete se přihlásit k odběru našeho newsletteru, abyste měli přehled o novinkách.

Contact.name: Vaše jméno
Contact.error: Při odesílání vaší zprávy došlo k chybě

ourStory.heading: Our Story
ourStory.content: In a world of conventional tech garages, we decided to carve a different path. We were a group of software enthusiasts – audacious, daring, and a bit irreverent – who believed that we could bring something different, something extraordinary, to the table. So we took our collective passion for building software products, threw in a healthy dose of audacity, and created our startup. We're not an agency. We're not a studio. We're a band of friends united by a shared love for what we do and how we do it. And we're just getting started.

ourPhilosophy.heading: Our Philosophy
ourPhilosophy.content: We believe that the best ideas often come from the most unexpected places. That's why we're all about thinking outside the box, challenging norms, and pushing boundaries. We're not afraid to break a few rules if it means finding a solution that others wouldn't dare to look for. We're not just here to build products – we're here to innovate, to disrupt, and to make a real impact. And we do it all with a smile, because life's too short to take ourselves too seriously.

ourTeam.heading: The Gang
ourTeam.content: Our team is our strength. We're a band of innovators, disruptors, rule-breakers, and most importantly, friends. We work together, argue together, challenge each other, and celebrate together. We believe that our diverse backgrounds, skills, and perspectives are our biggest asset. We're not just colleagues – we're a team. And just like any team, we've got our quirks. But we wouldn't have it any other way.

ourCommitment.heading: Our Commitment
ourCommitment.content: We're not just here to build products – we're here to build the best products. And we're not just competing with others – we're competing with ourselves. We constantly challenge ourselves to deliver faster, better, and more innovative solutions. We obsess over details, strive for perfection, and settle for nothing less than excellence. We know that we're capable of great things, and we're committed to proving it, one project at a time.

ourCulture.heading: Our Culture
ourCulture.content: We're serious about our work, but we don't take ourselves too seriously. We value humor, playfulness, and authenticity. We believe that the best ideas often come from the most heated debates, and we're not afraid of a little conflict. We might ruffle a few feathers along the way, but for us, it's all about staying true to who we are. We believe in being ourselves, in breaking rules, and in doing things our own way. Because at the end of the day, we're not just building products – we're building a culture.

Services.title: What we do
Services.subtitle: We don't just build products, we craft experiences

apps.heading: Crafting custom web app development
apps.content: We breathe life into ideas. If you have a concept for a web application, we're the team that can bring it to reality. We're not just coders – we're craftsmen, dedicated to delivering clean, efficient, and high-performance web apps. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail and our ability to deliver on tight deadlines, all while maintaining the highest quality standards.

product.heading: Joining your team for product development
product.content: Not all companies have the resources or expertise to develop their own web applications – and that's where we come in. We work closely with companies to understand their vision and then make it our own. We act as an extension of your team, handling everything from design to development, so you can focus on what you do best.

management.heading: Guiding you with consultancy in project management and operations
management.content: We're more than just developers, we're seasoned project managers, product people and operatives too. We'll help you streamline your processes, optimize your operations, and get the most out of your team by offering guidance and support in project management, agile practices, and business operations.

ourApproach.heading: How we work our magic
ourApproach.content: Our approach to work is a reflection of who we are - creative and audacious. We thrive on challenges, pushing boundaries, and thinking outside the box. We're not afraid of tough conversations or conflicts; we believe they lead to the best solutions. Our process is flexible and agile, allowing us to adapt and pivot as needed. Here's a peek into how we do what we do:

discovery.heading: Discovery & Ideation
discovery.content: We start by getting to know you and your idea. We dig deep to understand your vision, your goals, and your users. We ask the tough questions, challenge assumptions, and explore all possibilities. This is where we let our imaginations run wild, brainstorming ideas and coming up with innovative solutions. We're not just looking for good ideas – we're looking for the best idea.

planning.heading: Planning & Design
planning.content: Once we've got a clear understanding of your idea, we get to work on planning and design. We sketch, wireframe, and prototype, turning your idea into a tangible, visual concept. We're meticulous about details and obsessed with user experience. We ensure that every pixel is perfect and that the design is not just beautiful, but also intuitive and user-friendly.

development.heading: Development & Testing
development.content: This is where the magic happens. We roll up our sleeves and dive into coding, transforming the design into a fully functional product. We follow best coding practices, ensuring that the code is clean, efficient, and high-performing. We test rigorously, ironing out any bugs and making sure that the app is flawless before it sees the light of day. And we do it all with a sense of urgency, pushing ourselves to deliver faster and better.

delivery.heading: Launch & Support
delivery.content: The big day. We launch your web application, but our work doesn't end there. We stick around to ensure that everything runs smoothly, providing support and making any necessary tweaks. We're not just here to launch a web app – we're here to ensure its success. And even after the launch, we remain a part of your team, ready to help with updates, upgrades, or new features.
